Package lt.vtmc.exam

Interface TransportManager

  • public interface TransportManager
    Manages buses and passengers. The main responsibility for this class is to register available buses and register passengers for each of buses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Bus createBus​(java.lang.String id, int seats)
      Creates a new bus.
      Passenger createPassenger​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, int age)
      Creates a passenger.
      java.util.List<Passenger> findPassengersBy​(java.lang.String busId, PassengerPredicate predicate)
      Returns a list of passengers on the bus that matches a given predicate.
      double getAveragePassengerAge​(java.lang.String busId)
      Returns the average passengers' age on the bus.
      Bus getBusById​(java.lang.String busId)
      Returns a bus by its id.
      java.util.List<Bus> getCreatedBuses()
      Returns all registered buses.
      Passenger getOldestPassenger​(java.lang.String busId)
      Returns the oldest passenger on the bus or null if no passengers exist.
      java.util.Collection<Passenger> getOrderedPassengers​(java.lang.String busId)
      Order all passengers on the bus alphabetically by surname and then name.
      java.util.List<Passenger> getPassengers​(java.lang.String busId)
      Returns all passengers assigned to the bus.
      void registerPassenger​(Bus bus, int seatNo, Passenger passenger)
      Assigns a passenger to a bus.

      • getOrderedPassengers

        java.util.Collection<Passenger> getOrderedPassengers​(java.lang.String busId)
        Order all passengers on the bus alphabetically by surname and then name. I.e., if surnames differ, then order by them, if not, then order by name.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus identifier
        Returns:
        ordered Collection of Passengers

      • findPassengersBy

        java.util.List<Passenger> findPassengersBy​(java.lang.String busId,
                                           PassengerPredicate predicate)
        Returns a list of passengers on the bus that matches a given predicate.
        Parameters:
        busId - bus identifier
        predicate - search predicate
        Returns:
        list of passengers that this predicate matches.
